an9.40:2.3: khādanti → khāditaṃ (s1-3, mr), ogāhā ca → ogāhaṃ (bj) | ogāhāpi ca (s1-3, mr) | ogāhañca (pts1)
an9.40:2.5: obhaggobhaggañcassa sākhābhaṅgaṃ na khādanti → na obhaggobhaggañca sākhābhaṅgaṃ khādati (s1-3, mr)
an9.40:3.2: ogāhā → ettha pisaddo sabbatthapi, parimajjitvā → parimadditvā (bj, pts1), soṇḍaṃ saṃharati → kaṇḍuṃ saṃhanti (bj, pts1) kaṇḍuṃ saṃhanati (s1-3)
an9.40:5.8: soṇḍaṃ saṃharati → kaṇḍuṃ saṃhanti (bj, pts1) | kaṇḍuṃ saṃhanati (s1-3)
